citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection, the required program of veterinary care and contingency plan were not accessible for review.
These records must be maintained and made available for APHIS inspectors to assure compliance with specific
regulations.
Correct by December 15, 2022.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Advertising and Entertainment Manager.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of the inspection, the required program of veterinary care and contingency plan were not accessible for review. 
These records must be maintained and made available for APHIS inspectors to assure compliance with specific 
regulations. 
 
Correct by December 15, 2022. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Advertising and Entertainment Manager.
